ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A client for the Urban Dictionary <http://www.urbandictionary.com/> API.
A client for the Urban Dictionary <http://www.urbandictionary.com/> API.

name: r-udapi
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-udapi
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/udapi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/udapi/udapi_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c8986a63be002c4fb9b65a94fa91be4054dd53ea803661e1084945049b33d663

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-curl
    - r-httr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-curl
    - r-httr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('udapi')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('udapi')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/Ironholds/udapi/
  license: MIT
  summary: A client for the Urban Dictionary <http://www.urbandictionary.com/> API.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: udapi
# Type: Package
# Title: Urban Dictionary API Client
# Version: 0.1.3
# Date: 2018-08-18
# Author: Oliver Keyes [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Oliver Keyes <ironholds@gmail.com>
# Description: A client for the Urban Dictionary <http://www.urbandictionary.com/> API.
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# LazyData: TRUE
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# Imports: httr, curl
# BugReports: https://github.com/Ironholds/udapi/issues
# URL: https://github.com/Ironholds/udapi/
# Suggests: testthat
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-08-18 16:12:07 UTC; ironholds
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-08-18 16:40:03 UTC
